https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT``pinax-notifications`` is a user notification management app for the Django web framework.``pinax-notifications`` notifies users when certain events have occurred and allowsconfigurable options for how those notifications are received.Features--------* Submission of notification messages by other apps* Notification messages on signing in* Notification messages via email (configurable by user)* Ability to supply your own backend notification channels* Ability to scope notifications at the site levelSupported Django and Python
